descriptions: Owned CI/CD services for ML models as part of an engineering team. Developed the core logic for pipeline configuration queries, improving developer efficiency by 60%.
Built a real-time system monitoring dashboard, enhancing reliability and usability for 250+ engineers.
Selected as one of the few interns to present the work to the Senior Director for exceptional contributions.
Designed and implemented a CI/CD pipeline service, streamlining development workflows for 200+ organizational projects.
Increased pipeline resilience by automating failure recovery, cutting manual intervention by 90%.
Developed a low-latency DICOM data processor for real-time medical image visualization.
Streamlined deployment workflows using Azure DevOps, reducing deployment time by 70%.
Designed a custom ARM64-based device for internet caching, boosting access speeds by 600% and improving rural connectivity.
Integrated device telemetry using AWS IoT Core and MQTT, enabling efficient data integration.

research_experience.title: Lehigh University, HCI Lab
descriptions: Contributed to a $1.2M NSF-funded research project on computational framing analysis, leveraging hierarchical topic modeling techniques.
Developed a large-scale data pipeline to collect, clean, and process social media data, enabling scalable distributed training.
